title: Bloomberg Markets: CFRA's Muir on Monsanto Earnings
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: CFRA's Muir on Monsanto Earnings
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Christopher Muir Equity Analyst CFRA Research Discussing Monsanto getting a boost from U.S. farmers planting more soybeans than ever before. The world’s largest seed company reported fiscal third-quarter earnings on Wednesday that topped analysts’ estimates after an increase in sales of genetically modified soy seeds. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
